result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Gaston Edrick Hawkins

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Gaston Edrick Hawkins appeared by video.  Attorney William Anthony Rakestraw Ii in court for Gaston Edrick Hawkins.  Prosecuting attorney Grace M. Gall in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
CASE HELD OFF THE RECORD PER JUDGE.  Case in court for status conference.  Defense requests a plea/sentencing date.  Court set date as requested.  This matter will be held in person in Room 634 of the Courthouse.  Case adjourned to Branch 40.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for January 13, 2023 at 02:00 pm.

Defendant Gaston Edrick Hawkins not in court.  Attorney William Anthony Rakestraw Ii in court for Gaston Edrick Hawkins.  Attorney Stephanie Krueger in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for scheduling conference.  Court waives the defendant's appearance for purposes of today's proceedings.  Court set a status date.  Case adjourned to Branch 40.
Status conference scheduled for September 29, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Gaston Edrick Hawkins in court, appear by video with attorney William Anthony Rakestraw, appear in person.  Karine O'Byrne appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a Preliminary Hearing. Parties are advised that this case is assigned to Branch 40, Judge Shelton. Defendant waived Preliminary Hearing. Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire and Waiver received and filed. Court held colloquy with defendant. Probable cause has been found and the defendant is bound over for trial. Original Information e-filed, copy given to defense counsel who waived reading. Defense enters a plea of not guilty on behalf of the defendant. Case is adjourned to Br. 40.  Scheduling conference scheduled for August 30, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Received and Filed: Defense Preliminary Hearing Waiver
Received and Filed: Attorney William Rakestraw

Defendant Gaston Edrick Hawkins in court by telephone.  Erika Strebel appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing. The defendant claims to be ill and in the hospital. SPD has not appointed counsel. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 7, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Court ordered Justice Point Pretrial Services LEVEL 2 SUPERVISION.  Court reminders.
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with Kelly A.F.

ADDRESS INFO for Gaston Edrick Hawkins
Current: 2324 S Howell Ave, Milwaukee, WI 53207 United States  (Effective: 04-13-2022)
Prior: 816 Security Drive, E107, Fond Du Lac, WI 54935

Defendant Gaston Edrick Hawkins in court with attorney Helmi Hamad.  Defendant Gaston Edrick Hawkins in custody.  Karine O'Byrne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Gaston Edrick Hawkins appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Shelton, Branch 40. Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 25, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Arrest Warrant received from the D.A.'s office on filing date of Criminal Complaint.
